documents.document: To find out more about what I'm up in the National Assembly & how to contact me, please visit my website https://t.co/5d2ZSoeqeZ @UKIP #UKIP

Absolute lie. Stop trying to make political capital out of the Holocaust. #Disgusting https://t.co/ayBkdufWvC

Parliament must now get on and pass legislation to enact Article 50. Whatever the remoaners think Britain will leave the EU. #UKIP @UKIP

Carwyn admits he wants no immigration controls. The Norwegian model would be a terrible deal for the U.K - Wales voted to take back control!
.@fmwales kindly answers my question on immigration however admits he wants the UK to adopt the Norwegian model. Absolutely unacceptable.

@arwynbayley @nomorescamseve1 @NFUtweets @NFUCymru of course you do and, as I said, thank you for being so frank.
@arwynbayley @NFUtweets @NFUCymru well that is for them to answer not me - thanks for being frank.
@arwynbayley @NFUtweets REPEAT: I was invited by the NFU so, clearly, they want to hear what I have to say even if you do not.
@LeanneWood I would be happy to talk to you about the truth rather than gossip. Your office or mine? Next week?
@arwynbayley @NFUtweets Because I was invited to do so by the NFU. I am UKIP spokesman for Agriculture.
